mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k1_tb_contract ( salesTsCode, mainBusinessCode, clientCode, lsAccountCode, contractCode, vatType, amount, VAT, totalPrice, dealDate, briefs )VALUES( #{salesTsCode}, #{mainBusinessCode}, #{clientCode}, #{lsAccountCode}, #{contractCode}, #{amount}, #{VAT}, #{totalPrice}, #{dealDate}, #{briefs} );
mapper.select: SELECT st.salesTsCode as salesTsCode, st.mainBusinessCode as mainBusinessCode, st.clientCode as clientCode, st.lsAccountCode as lsAccountCode, st.contractCode as contractCode, st.vatType as vatType, st.amount as amount, st.VAT as VAT, st.totalPrice as totalPrice, st.dealDate as dealDate, st.briefs as briefs, u.userName as userName, st.regDate as regDate, st.updateDate as updateDate FROM k1_tb_sales_transaction AS st INNER JOIN k1_tb_user as u on st.mainBusinessCode = u.mainBusinessCode GROUP BY st.salesTsCode;

SELECT st.salesTsCode, st.mainBusinessCode, st.clientCode, st.lsAccountCode, st.contractCode, st.vatType, st.amount, st.VAT, st.totalPrice, st.dealDate, st.briefs, u.userName, st.regDate, st.updateDate FROM k1_tb_sales_transaction AS st INNER JOIN k1_tb_user as u on st.mainBusinessCode = u.mainBusinessCode GROUP BY st.salesTsCode;
